metadata.title: CVE-2024-46794 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:x86/tdx: Fix data leak in mmio_read()The mmio_read() function makes a TDVMCALL to retrieve MMIO data for anaddress from the VMM.Sean noticed that mmio_read() unintentionally exposes the value of aninitialized variable (val) on the stack to the VMM.This variable is only needed as an output value. It did not need to bepassed to the VMM in the first place.Do not send the original value of *val to the VMM.[ dhansen: clarify what 'val' is used for. ]
